title: Party Time Series- Todoroki Ending
body:
1.5K 

Request: “Could i pease ask for a smutty/snfw scenario where todoroki and his female crush who has a stoic personality (they are both crushing on eachother but don’t want to say anything) are at a party and are involuntarily shoved into a closet for 7 minutes in heaven, they may or may not be slightly tipsy/drunk. Things get steamy and nsfw. thank you 〔´∇｀〕”

Warnings: NSFW, dry humping 

Notes: The Opening Scenario and the explanation of this series can be found in my masterlist. 

Todoroki

The look that you gave Mina when you saw whose name you drew was far from impressed. She was unfazed by your apparent ire, the broad grin on her face unyielding as she pointed towards the nearest closet.

“You know the rules, Y/N! Off you go.”

You thought about just walking away, not only from the game, but from the party in its entirety, but you were distracted from that plan by some scuffling behind you. Looking back, you saw Shouto being shoved into the closet by Kirishima, and before you could have any sort of reaction to that, you found yourself being pushed forward, only to be betrayed by the same redhead. The closet door was immediately shut behind you, the click of the knob almost deafening as you found yourself pressed into Shouto’s chest, courtesy of the shove that Kirishima had given you.  

You immediately backed up as much as you could, and luckily it wasn’t exactly the smallest closet in the world, so there was about a foot of distance between you and Shouto. It was…unbearably quiet, neither of you saying a word. You were usually so good at hiding your emotions, but at that moment, you were struggling, the proximity to your crush overbearing as a nervous feeling chewed at your gut. You were grateful for the darkness of the closet, feeling that it at least gave you some small amount of protection from your embarrassment since Shouto couldn’t see you struggling, but then the heterochromatic hero decided to take out his phone.

The flashlight from Shouto’s phone was blinding at first, but he quickly angled it away from both of you so it wasn’t shining right in your eyes. You were pointedly less comfortable now, the darkness no longer there to help you conceal your nervousness, and that tension was only made worse by Shouto’s unbothered demeanor. It stung to know that he wasn’t as anxious as you were, because you assumed that could only mean he didn’t reciprocate your feelings in the slightest.

“Y/N.”

“Hm?”

“What are we…supposed to do in here?”

You’d prefer to just wait the whole seven minutes out in silence and then run off to stew in your misery alone, but he didn’t need to know that. Part of you was surprised that he had never heard of Seven Minutes in Heaven, but another part of you chimed in that it was Todoroki that you were talking to, so it probably would’ve been more surprising if he actually had heard of it.

“I believe the point of the game is to shove two people into a closet so they can fool around, but obviously that isn’t a necessity.”

“Fool around as in…?”

“Well, it’s only seven minutes, so I doubt that anything too…erotic happens. Probably just some kissing and whatnot.”

“I see…Do you want me to kiss you?”

You could certainly put that on the list of things that you never thought Todoroki would say to you. It took you off guard, and you could feel the heat starting to tinge your cheeks as you turned away from Shouto. It was a nice thought, but at this point, you knew that having a taste of something that you would never actually have in full would only lead to more heartache for you.

“It’s fine, Todoroki. We don’t have to go along with this silly game, especially if you don’t want.”

“But I want to kiss you.”

The series of coughs that rang throughout the closet came courtesy of you, because that statement was enough to make you literally choke on the air that you were trying to breathe. If your blush hadn’t been noticeable before, it certainly was now, because your face felt like it was on fire. Shouto remained unperturbed as usual, or at least you thought he did until you noticed the faint hint of pink trailing along his own cheeks. It was hard to make out with only the light of his flashlight brightening the closet, but you were sure that it was real.

“W-what?”

“I…want to kiss you.”

“Are you ser -why?”

“I’ve wanted to kiss you for a long time, Y/N, I just didn’t think that you wanted to kiss me.”

At any other point, you would have found it odd how quickly you switched from being a ball of self-pity to practically throwing yourself at Shouto so you could finally kiss him, but honestly, you were feeling a whirlwind of emotions at that point, and it seemed like Shouto was the only person who could calm that storm. As many times as you had pictured this moment, it still exceeded your expectations; Shouto’s lips felt so amazing against yours, and the warmth that radiated from them calmed every nerve that had been tormenting you throughout this silly game. His hands had immediately gone to your waist, his grip on you firm as he pulled your body closer to his.

The first kiss didn’t last long, but as brief as it was, it was still perfect in your opinion. Shouto slowly opened his eyes, looking into your own to search for any signs of regret or hesitation, but when he found none of that, he quickly pulled you in for another kiss, this one much more hurried, his lips moving frantically against yours. It was as if he was trying to make up for lost time, and you tried your best to keep up with him, unable to get enough of him now that you had finally gotten a taste of the lips that you had craved for so long. It was a sloppy kiss, as were the ones that followed it, and at some point Shouto had slid down to the floor, pulling you along with him and setting you on his lap.

The closet was getting unbearably hot, your need for Shouto taking on a much more carnal nature as he so desperately held onto you. You tried to get even closer to him, needing to feel more of him, and you inadvertently brushed your pelvis down against his, causing Shouto to briefly pull away from you so he could let out a groan. You slammed your lips back against his, empowered by his reaction, and you ground your hips against him again, purposefully this time, with much more pressure behind your movement.

You could feel the gasp hitch in Shouto’s throat, and his grip on you got even tighter as he started to guide your movements. The party was long forgotten at that point, and it had obviously been well over seven minutes since you got pushed into the closet. For whatever reason, no one had interrupted the two of you yet, so you were going to take the opportunity that you had been given.

Each rhythmic movement of your hips sent shocks of pleasure running through Shouto’s spine, and it was a good thing that you were preoccupying his lips, because otherwise, he wasn’t sure that he would’ve been able to keep quiet. He had waited so long just to be able to touch you, so he would gladly take whatever you wanted to give him. Your pace steadily kept increasing as Shouto reacted more and more to what you were doing to him, breathing out subtle groans against your lips, his fingers digging into the flesh of your hips, his own hips trying to buck up into you for more friction.

It all reached its peak soon enough, with Shouto letting out a drawn-out groan as he leaned into you, his lips stopping in their tracks and his grip finally loosening as he rode out the high that you had given him. You ran your fingers through his hair, relishing in the triumph that you felt for making him feel so good, but before you could linger on that feeling for too long, there was a sudden shift in your positioning, and you found yourself staring up at the ceiling as Shouto hovered over you. The position was a bit awkward given the small space you that were in, and Shouto had to really curl in on himself to make it work, plus your legs were propped up on the wall behind him, but you hardly minded it.

How could you care about your positioning, when Shouto looked at you with so much reverence and lust in his eyes? To ensure that there wouldn’t be any interruptions, Shouto reached up and froze the doorknob. It would take a while for the ice to melt away, especially without his fire to assist it, so he was left with plenty of time to repay you for your efforts…

As for the party outside of the closet, Mina had directed everyone to another closet, continuing on with the game and giving you and Shouto some privacy. Some of the others questioned what she was doing, but she didn’t pay them any mind; she was trying to play wingwoman for you, not them, and if they had an issue with that, then they could get over it. There was another closet close by, so the party could continue without the two of you having to leave the one you were in. She didn’t know how long you would stay in there without anyone telling you to leave, but she figured that the two of you would need a lot of time to figure things out, anyways.

Shouto remained unperturbed as usual, or at least you thought he did until you noticed the faint hint of pink trailing along his own cheeks. It was hard to make out with only the light of his flashlight brightening the closet, but you were sure that it was real.

“I…want to kiss you.”

“Are you ser -why?”

“I’ve wanted to kiss you for a long time, Y/N, I just didn’t think that you wanted to kiss me.”

As many times as you had pictured this moment, it still exceeded your expectations; Shouto’s lips felt so amazing against yours, and the warmth that radiated from them calmed every nerve that had been tormenting you throughout this silly game. His hands had immediately gone to your waist, his grip on you firm as he pulled your body closer to his.

The first kiss didn’t last long, but as brief as it was, it was still perfect in your opinion. Shouto slowly opened his eyes, looking into your own to search for any signs of regret or hesitation, but when he found none of that, he quickly pulled you in for another kiss, this one much more hurried, his lips moving frantically against yours. It was as if he was trying to make up for lost time, and you tried your best to keep up with him, unable to get enough of him now that you had finally gotten a taste of the lips that you had craved for so long. It was a sloppy kiss, as were the ones that followed it, and at some point Shouto had slid down to the floor, pulling you along with him and setting you on his lap.

You tried to get even closer to him, needing to feel more of him, and you inadvertently brushed your pelvis down against his, causing Shouto to briefly pull away from you so he could let out a groan. You slammed your lips back against his, empowered by his reaction, and you ground your hips against him again, purposefully this time, with much more pressure behind your movement.

You could feel the gasp hitch in Shouto’s throat, and his grip on you got even tighter as he started to guide your movements. The party was long forgotten at that point, and it had obviously been well over seven minutes since you got pushed into the closet. For whatever reason, no one had interrupted the two of you yet, so you were going to take the opportunity that you had been given.

Each rhythmic movement of your hips sent shocks of pleasure running through Shouto’s spine, and it was a good thing that you were preoccupying his lips, because otherwise, he wasn’t sure that he would’ve been able to keep quiet. He had waited so long just to be able to touch you, so he would gladly take whatever you wanted to give him. Your pace steadily kept increasing as Shouto reacted more and more to what you were doing to him, breathing out subtle groans against your lips, his fingers digging into the flesh of your hips, his own hips trying to buck up into you for more friction.

It all reached its peak soon enough, with Shouto letting out a drawn-out groan as he leaned into you, his lips stopping in their tracks and his grip finally loosening as he rode out the high that you had given him. You ran your fingers through his hair, relishing in the triumph that you felt for making him feel so good, but before you could linger on that feeling for too long, there was a sudden shift in your positioning, and you found yourself staring up at the ceiling as Shouto hovered over you. The position was a bit awkward given the small space you that were in, and Shouto had to really curl in on himself to make it work, plus your legs were propped up on the wall behind him, but you hardly minded it.

How could you care about your positioning, when Shouto looked at you with so much reverence and lust in his eyes? To ensure that there wouldn’t be any interruptions, Shouto reached up and froze the doorknob. It would take a while for the ice to melt away, especially without his fire to assist it, so he was left with plenty of time to repay you for your efforts…

Some of the others questioned what she was doing, but she didn’t pay them any mind; she was trying to play wingwoman for you, not them, and if they had an issue with that, then they could get over it. There was another closet close by, so the party could continue without the two of you having to leave the one you were in. She didn’t know how long you would stay in there without anyone telling you to leave, but she figured that the two of you would need a lot of time to figure things out, anyways.

title: tempestuous
description:
by sopes

Izuku woke up and immediately remembered the scarf. He bumped into Katsuki’s chest and returned it to him, hoping he wouldn’t get mad at his sudden greeting.

Instead, Katsuki throws the scarf around his neck and embraces the shy boy tightly. Wordlessly, he walks away, and Izuku is left a blushing mess.

Lovers. Izuku liked to believe they’re lovers, but the punk is too proud to confess. He’ll just have to make him say it at one point in time.

For now, however, they were caught in a tempestuous state—frenzied with uncontrolled want and desire whenever they encountered each other, letting their fantasies run wild in hopes they would fulfill them someday.

summary:
@hopeaterart 
Midoriya: (Humming walking to class minding his business)
Ururaka: Hey Deku!
Midoriya: Oh hi Ururaka.
Ururaka: I...
body:
@hopeaterart

Midoriya: (Humming walking to class minding his business)

Ururaka: Hey Deku!

Midoriya: Oh hi Ururaka.

Ururaka: I was just about to text you- Wait isn’t that Kaminari?

Kaminari was at a small novelty toy shop he was dead set on finding something he’d want. Jirou’s there to cause someones gotta make fun of him.

Kaminari: Man this is too hard! How can anyone choose from so many.

Jirou: Why don’t you just take one and leave we’ll be late to class otherwise.

Kaminari: I, first of all, never asked you to come here you must just really love my company.

Jirou: As if, a tree has more personality than you.

Kaminari: Hey not cool!

Jirou: How about you get this one (Picks up Electric Gum toy) Wait who’re you gonna prank again?

Kaminari just smiled mischievously.

Jirou: … …(Sudden realisation) He’ll kill you.

Midoriya: Hey guys.

Kaminari: Hiyah Midoriyah! Just about to get this electric gum Jirou picked out.

Ururaka: Who’re you using it on?

Kaminari smiles again.

Ururaka: … …(Sudden realisation) R.I.P. you XD.

Kaminari: Now all I need is–

Midoriya: What’s wrong?

Kaminari: I LEFT ALL MY YEN AT HOME! I’VE ONLY GOT 700 WITH ME!

Jirou: Why does a novelty toy cost more than that much!?

Kaminari: Boy has my day been ruined.

???: Here you go.

Kaminari: Huh? *Gasp*

Midoriya: What’s the matter Kamin- (Enters geek mode) I-It’s Starry Knight!

Kaabi: Hi! And just call me Kaabi! Also, here you go sparky 1500 Yen. (Hands it to him)

Kaminari: I can’t take your money from you sir!

Kaabi: Please I can spare some money for a friend in need of assistance.

Kaminari: Really!? Thanks man!

Midoriya: Err…Starry Knight? Could you sign my hero notebook!?

Kaabi: Sure thing.

Ururaka & Jirou: Why am I not surprised?

-Later-

Mina: WHAT DO YOU MEAN YOU MET STARRY KNIGHT AND DIDN’T BRING ME!!!???

Midoriya: H-H-Hey we didn’t expect him to appear from nowhere!

Kaminari, running for his life: SHIT! SHIT! SHIT!

Bakugou, bolting after him: KAMINARI YOU BASTARD JUST WAIT TILL I GET MY HANDS ON YOU!!!

Jirou: He actually did it? What an idiot.

-The door slid openall the students lookat the door eagerly. Starry Knight stepped in unexpectedly-

Kaabi: Hi!

Mina: … …STARRY KNIGHT!!!

Kaabi: Please just call me Kaabi (Winks)

Mina: I feel like I’m dreaming! Someone pinch me!

Hagakure: Ok (Punches her)

Mina: OW! I said “Pinch” not “Punch!”

Hagakure: Oops my bad!

Midoriya: How come you’re here Kaabi, sir?

Starry Knight: Your teacher’s wanted a Pro from a well known agency to teach you today that’s what I was doing when I passed you earlier. ButI got lost hehehe. How’s Sparky doing with that electric gum?

Kaminari, still running: I’M SORRY!!!

Bakugou: NOTHING YOU SAY CAN SAVE YOU!!!

Jirou: He’s seen better days, but to me these are those days.

Starry Knight: So let’s begin shall we!?

Mina: AND THEY’RE GONNA BE TEACHING US!? Now I must definitely be dreaming, pinch me!

Someone pinched her thigh.

Mina: AH! WHO DID THAT!?

Mineta: You said pinch you. Hehehe.

Mina: NOT THERE YOU–

-Kaabi suddenly appeared before Mineta causing a shockwave as he halted himself.-

Mineta: What the!?

Kaabi: *Points agressivley* People like you make me sick. All women are queens and should be treated as such not just your own personal item. (Slams fist on Mineta’s desk causing it to crack a bit) Do you understand!?

Mineta: YEPYEPYEP LOUD AND CLEAR SIR!!! (Is now shaking in pure fear)

Kaabi, now extremley tame: Thank you UwU!

Sero: … …Automatically, best teacher ever!

Ojiro: No arguements there.

Kaminari: I, first of all, never asked you to come here you must just really love my company.

Jirou: As if, a tree has more personality than you.

Kaminari: Hey not cool!

Jirou: How about you get this one (Picks up Electric Gum toy) Wait who’re you gonna prank again?

Kaminari just smiled mischievously.

Jirou: … …(Sudden realisation) He’ll kill you.

Midoriya: Hey guys.

Kaminari: Hiyah Midoriyah! Just about to get this electric gum Jirou picked out.

Ururaka: Who’re you using it on?

Kaminari smiles again.

Ururaka: … …(Sudden realisation) R.I.P. you XD.

Kaminari: Now all I need is–

Midoriya: What’s wrong?

Kaminari: I LEFT ALL MY YEN AT HOME! I’VE ONLY GOT 700 WITH ME!

Jirou: Why does a novelty toy cost more than that much!?

Kaminari: Boy has my day been ruined.

???: Here you go.

Kaminari: Huh? *Gasp*

Midoriya: What’s the matter Kamin- (Enters geek mode) I-It’s Starry Knight!

Kaabi: Hi! And just call me Kaabi! Also, here you go sparky 1500 Yen. (Hands it to him)

Kaminari: I can’t take your money from you sir!

Kaabi: Please I can spare some money for a friend in need of assistance.

Kaminari: Really!? Thanks man!

Midoriya: Err…Starry Knight? Could you sign my hero notebook!?

Kaabi: Sure thing.

Ururaka & Jirou: Why am I not surprised?

-Later-

Mina: WHAT DO YOU MEAN YOU MET STARRY KNIGHT AND DIDN’T BRING ME!!!???

Midoriya: H-H-Hey we didn’t expect him to appear from nowhere!

Kaminari, running for his life: SHIT! SHIT! SHIT!

Bakugou, bolting after him: KAMINARI YOU BASTARD JUST WAIT TILL I GET MY HANDS ON YOU!!!

Jirou: He actually did it? What an idiot.

-The door slid openall the students lookat the door eagerly. Starry Knight stepped in unexpectedly-

Kaabi: Hi!

Mina: … …STARRY KNIGHT!!!

Kaabi: Please just call me Kaabi (Winks)

Mina: I feel like I’m dreaming! Someone pinch me!

Hagakure: Ok (Punches her)

Mina: OW! I said “Pinch” not “Punch!”

Hagakure: Oops my bad!

Midoriya: How come you’re here Kaabi, sir?

Starry Knight: Your teacher’s wanted a Pro from a well known agency to teach you today that’s what I was doing when I passed you earlier. ButI got lost hehehe. How’s Sparky doing with that electric gum?

Kaminari, still running: I’M SORRY!!!

Bakugou: NOTHING YOU SAY CAN SAVE YOU!!!

Jirou: He’s seen better days, but to me these are those days.

Starry Knight: So let’s begin shall we!?

Mina: AND THEY’RE GONNA BE TEACHING US!? Now I must definitely be dreaming, pinch me!

Someone pinched her thigh.

Mina: AH! WHO DID THAT!?

Mineta: You said pinch you. Hehehe.

Mina: NOT THERE YOU–

-Kaabi suddenly appeared before Mineta causing a shockwave as he halted himself.-

Mineta: What the!?

Kaabi: *Points agressivley* People like you make me sick. All women are queens and should be treated as such not just your own personal item. (Slams fist on Mineta’s desk causing it to crack a bit) Do you understand!?

Mineta: YEPYEPYEP LOUD AND CLEAR SIR!!! (Is now shaking in pure fear)

Kaabi, now extremley tame: Thank you UwU!

Sero: … …Automatically, best teacher ever!

Ojiro: No arguements there.

summary: Party Time Series: Opening Scenario- Students
title: Party Time Series: Opening Scenario- Students
body:
Notes: The explanation of this series can be found in my masterlist. 

You were seriously beginning to question your friendship with Mina. This was only supposed to be an innocent, professional gathering, a reunion of sorts between your classmates and some other students that you knew who had graduated around the same time as you did. It was going to be a celebration of everyone’s success in becoming heroes, but apparently, heroics did not necessarily equate responsibility, and the whole thing had spiraled out of control and gone from a semi-formal gathering to a full-on party, mostly thanks to Mina’s encouragements.

She hadn’t stopped there, either. As if the loud, pounding music and free-flowing alcohol hadn’t been enough for her, she started bringing out party games. Never in your life had you seen a game of Twister escalate so quickly, competitive natures clashing and leading to profound feats of flexibility, the raging hormones of young adults working similar magic. It was awfully debauch for what should have been a simple game, but that hadn’t been enough for Mina, either.

The round of Truth or Dare that she started had been quite…eventful and informative, but what she suggested next was what made you so uncertain about your association to her. By some miracle, you had made it through the entirety of your high school career without being forced into a game of Seven Minutes in Heaven, but thanks to an awful turn of fate, your luck in that had run out as an adult. The game itself would have been enough to make you nervous, but things were much more complicated because you may have carried a bit of a flame for one of the participants in the game way back when and said flame may have never really died out.

Of course, with so many people playing the game, the chances of you being paired with your crush were pretty low, but you were still nervous about it, especially when you saw the devious smirk that Mina shot your way. Surely there was no way that she could rig the game…surely. Even if she was the one writing down everyone’s names on strips of paper to put into a bag, surely someone would notice if she put the same name on each piece of paper. She undoubtedly knew who you had a crush on, but surely she wouldn’t use that against you.

Based on the way that she immediately shoved the bag in your face once she had everything set up, it became undeniable that she was, in fact, using that knowledge against you, especially once you saw that evil gleam in her eyes…
